property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, discard the top3 cards of your deck. Add 1 Kick card discarded this way to your hand.

property.value: E Commit: Your Kick attack gets +2 speed. Chun Li E: Your Ranged attack gets Stun:1

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -1 speed for each card in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Your Kick attack gets +2 damage for each attack card discarded this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack's speed is 6 or greater, seal 1 of your opponent's foundations. E Destroy: If your attack's speed is 6 or greater, gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your Ranged attack deals damage, your next Kick attack gets +2 damage. E Flip: If your Kick attack deals damage, your next attack gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Change this attack's zone to low. If it is not a Kick attack, it gets -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your Kick attack gets +2 damage. Chun Li E Commit, flip: If your Kick attack's speed is 6 or greater, it gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: If the speed or damage of your opponent's attack is above 6, reduce its damage to 0.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Flip: After a card leaves your card pool due to an effect, ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage. If it is blocked, your next attack gets +1. R [Once per Turn]: After you completely block an attack, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals 2 damage during the Damage Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your next attack gets +1 speed. E: If this attack is blocked, your opponent commits 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Ryu E: This attack gets +1 to its Powerful rating. E: If you have played at least 2 other attacks this turn, add 2 cards from your hand to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked, add 1 foundation (that you could normally play) from your hand to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you played this attack's EX ability, draw 1c ard then add 1 card from your hand to your momentum.

property.value: E Commit, flip: If the speed of your opponent's attack is above printed, your next check gets +3.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Change this attack's zone to mid. Playable while committed. R Commit: After your opponent adds 2 or more cards to their hand due to their effect, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Look at the top card of your deck. E Discard 1 momentum: Ready this foundation. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: Your next check to play an attack gets +2. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: AFter you block with this card, add it to your staging area committed. E Destroy: Choose 1 card in your opponent's card pool. For the rest of this Combat PHase, it cannot leave their card pool. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your non-Throw attack deals damage, add 1 card from your hand to your momentum and your opponent discards 1 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: Your attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage. If it is blocked, your next check gets +1.
